title.narrative: UN Plan of Action on the Safety of Journalists implemented, and awareness raising on press freedom and journalists' safety ensured, including through WPFD/Prize and IDEI

description.narrative:
As lead coordinator of the UN Plan of Action on the Safety of Journalists, UNESCO will implement, together with partners, a range of activities to promote the safety of journalists through awareness-raising; standard-setting and policy advice; monitoring and reporting; capacity building; academic research; and partnership building. Areas of focus will include: training of law enforcement actors and the judiciary on freedom of expression; supporting national safety mechanisms for the safety of journalists; and addressing the specific risks faced by women journalists.
The celebration of WPFD (3 May) and IDEI (2 November) will constitute two cornerstones of UNESCO's awareness-raising efforts on press freedom and the safety of journalists.
